abstract: The retailer will open at 6 p.m. on Thanksgiving Day for the second year, the first time in years that it did not move up its opening times.
snippet: The retailer will open at 6 p.m. on Thanksgiving Day for the second year, the first time in years that it did not move up its opening times.
lead_paragraph: Target doesn’t want Americans to miss Thanksgiving dinner — but with its stores opening at 6 p.m. that day for a second year running, shoppers may still have to choose between sales and dessert.

headline.main: Target Keeps Thanksgiving Opening at 6 p.m. on the Holiday
